original_text: The people in Moab were afraid because there were so many Israelites. All the people in Moab became very afraid of the Israelites.
korean_text: 모압이 심히 두려워하였으니 이스라엘 백성이 많음으로 말미암아 모압이 이스라엘 자손 때문에 번민하더라

sentences.original_text: The people in Moab were afraid
because there were so many Israelites
All the people in Moab became very afraid
